notes.heading: Unsaid Feelings & Thoughts
title: The First Glance
The Sound of Your Laughter
What If You Knew?
Butterflies
Daydreams
The Fear of Losing You
You're My Muse
text: The moment our eyes met, time slowed down. Your smile was like sunlight breaking through the clouds, and I knew right thenâ€”you are someone special.
Your laughter is my favorite melody. It's contagious, warm, and feels like home. I find myself doing silly things just to hear it again.
If you knew how much I admire you, would things change? Would you smile the same way? Would you look at me or treat me differently? Or has you known all along?
Every time you're near, my heart races, and my stomach fills with butterflies. It's like my body knows you are magic before my mind can even process it.
I catch myself imagining what it would be like to hold your hand, to tell you how I feel, to share a life with you. You're the star of all my daydreams.
What if you never feels the same way? The thought of you slipping away terrifies me. But even if you're not mine, I'll just always cherish the way you makes me feel alive.
You inspires me to be better, to dream bigger, and to love deeper. Even if you never knows, you've already changed my life in ways I can't explain.
